main: ^It seems like you got everything down! I’ve got some catching materials for you, kid!

c-1: ^Do you know who you’re talking to? Back in the old days, I used to be a pro.

knot1: ^I think I’ve got a plan for tonight. You can't catch the fox when they're sleeping with their cubs; dens can lead in tunnels that are up to 75 ft long! Individually chasing them in an open will also be a pain. Wait until 16:00 at their den location and catch them when they wake up!
^Wait, I have to chase the fox?

c-0: ^Don't worry, he’s probably tiny. Just make yourself big and aggressive, and he’ll have no chance.

knot2: ^You better get going. Don’t want to be here all day.
